name: thedailybeast
text:
New York City Police showed up to the home of a BLM activist with two dozen cop cars, guard dogs, and a helicopter.

In a livestream of the tense encounter, Derrick Ingram asked, “What did I do? What did I do? I was born Black. That’s what I did." https://t.co/SC4S9g3mEC

name: thedailybeast
text: Activists are bypassing politicians in the fight against evictions. Instead, they want to shut down the machinery of the system: the nation’s housing courts and the people who make it run https://t.co/feVG8ilcpB

text: Illinois, which was walloped by the coronavirus in the spring, is facing a fierce resurgence of the virus https://t.co/aJNTElRHFo

text: Why the fixation on hydroxychloroquine at all costs? https://t.co/u4jeeytquQ

name: thedailybeast
text: "Donald Trump’s father was a study in cruelty and tyranny, producing a son who, in order to get paternal approval, or even be noticed, had to be at least as cruel, " writes Patti Davis https://t.co/JEalI3lVmg

name: thedailybeast
text: Madalena McNeil is accused of buying red paint before a protest. Under aggressive new criminal charges, it could mean she spends the rest of her life in prison https://t.co/wqKOfA43Av
